title: LZG Corner Shower Caddy Wall Mount for Bathroom, ABS Plastic Floating Corner Shelf Corner Storage Holder Organizer Adhesive NO-Drilling (Color : White)
features: ✔ Convenient & Healthy - Using adhesive suction shower caddy, you can keep your shower gel, shampoo or conditioner within convenient reach over the bathtub. Maximize efficiency of the space to create healthy organized and tidy bathroom showers.

✔ Strong & Space save - Work with very strong adhesive tape, keep your expensive shower gel and shampoo always hanging on the wall. Remove cleanly with no sticky residue or damage left behind. Tips: If you want to remove it, heat the sticker by hairdryer, rip off slowly.

✔ Features & Advantage - Made of new rustproof ABS plastic, easy to clean, higher strength, durable service. Widely application meet your different demands. large capacity for holding shampoo, shower gel or conditioner, etc. Ideal for bathrooms, showers, guest bathrooms and powder rooms etc.
✔ Easy and Quick installation - Sticking on any smooth surface such as shower tile, marble and glass. Note: ONLY for 90° corner.
✔ Our Service and Guaranteed - Any questions or suggestions please let us know firstly when you receive it. THX! We will resolve it till you satisfy.
